subject: Re: Massey Family Chiro Blogs check/upload

full_threads.body:
Hi Dimitri, 

Apologies, I didn't attach the progress spreadsheet to the previous email. 

You can view it here: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1kSCDyZGQTSVI3u1JqVIf90Qt48Q6DvZpNFvLldn0fow/edit?usp=sharing

Hi Dimitri, 

Confirming the following issues have been corrected:
  • Missing meta descriptions
  • Title too long
  • Missing H1
  • URL too long
Please note that pages such as https://masseyfamilychiropractic.com.au/service-areas/balgowlah-chiropractor/ were marked as "URL too long" were not modified as shortening would remove critical keywords. This isn't something we were prepared to do without knowing more about the strategy for this website. As a precaution, we ran a SEMrush SEO audit and the URLs were not flagged as being too long. That report is attached. 

The total time spent on this task was 5.5 hours. Please let me know if you have any questions.

action.text: Joel Maligalig assigned to Chris Paradowski

full_threads.body: @joel can you please also tell me where redirections are found on this website? Thanks!

@joel can I please get a hang with this?

Article: https://masseyfamilychiropractic.com.au/6-signs-you-need-a-sports-injury-specialist/ has been flagged for a Title that is too long. 
I believe it is being automatically added in the SEO data. 

the screenshot show "| Massey Family Chiropractic" is being added automatically.
Just a friendly reminder that this ticket has been open for over 5 days. Please close it if it's resolved or follow up if necessary. Thanks so much!

Hi Dimitri,

Confirming 2 new blogs were added:
https://masseyfamilychiropractic.com.au/chiropractic-care-for-chronic-migraine-what-to-expect/
https://masseyfamilychiropractic.com.au/addressing-migraines-your-path-to-a-pain-free-lifestyle/

One blog had the images updated:
https://masseyfamilychiropractic.com.au/5-qualities-to-look-for-in-a-chiropractor/

Next steps
We are now moving on to the SEO updates and will report back once complete.

Hi @manuel, thanks!

1. For any blogs that already appear, please update images if needed. 
2. Any blogs not published. 

Please let me know the quantity of updated blogs and the quantity of uploaded blogs. Thanks.

action.text: Manuel Lito Manceli assigned to Chris Paradowski

full_threads.body: @chris I found some of the blog articles are already posted... some have not yet or something lost picture... may I know if I need to update the lost picture and upload some articles that don't exist? Let me know.

@manuel are you able to help with the upload of these blogs as well?

Please take note of Author and Publish dates. If you need a hand, please let me know!

Hi Chris,

Thanks for quoting it up. We do have an arrangement with Heath for a much lower hourly rate price (I think it was $25/hr). Can we get these tasks and any future tasks done within the current arrangement so not to over stretch our costs on some of these misc tasks?

Thanks,
Dimitri

Hi Dimitri, 

There are 147 pages that have one of the following issues:
  • Missing H1
  • Title too long
  • Missing description
We estimate needing between 3-6 minutes per page to resolve these. 

I have sent you a formal quote, please let me know if you need anything else.

Give me some options Chris. How many hours would the whole shebang take!

Dimitri Galanis

Director & Strategist

Hi Dimitri,

Thanks for sharing the content. Will will be uploaded these as a priority and provide an update as soon as possible. 

Regarding the SEO, would you like us to quote on fixing all the SEO issues outlined in the report? (or just the URLs that are too long).
